protocols

Class P4protocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • protocols.P4protocol

  • public class P4protocol
extends java.lang.Object
    An application-level protocol for communication between NSever (notifications server) and NGServer (NServer's Guardian).
    Author:
    dudu
